cards.title: From hippies to hip-hop heads / 50 years of style tribes

item.title: From hippies to hip-hop heads: 50 years of style tribes
item.trailText: Ever since teddy boys started stalking the streets of Britain with their dandy looks, teen scenes have come thick and fast. A new book documents them all: mods and rockers, punks and ravers
item.standFirst:
Ever since teddy boys started stalking the streets of Britain with their dandy looks, teen scenes have come thick and fast. A new book documents them all: mods and rockers, punks and ravers

• Street Culture is available from Plexus Publishing at £14.99

displayImages.caption:
Teddy boys
With a streetwise 1950s blend of Edwardian dandyism, Savile Row fashion and styles borrowed from Hollywood westerns, teddy boys were Britain’s first identifiable youth tribe Photograph: Joseph McKeown/Getty Images
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Teddy boys
With a streetwise 1950s blend of Edwardian dandyism, Savile Row fashion and styles borrowed from Hollywood westerns, teddy boys were Britain’s first identifiable youth tribe

displayImages.caption:
Mods
The Who, posing on Brighton pier in mod revival style
displayImages.altText: The Who, posing on Brighton Pier in mod revival style
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Mods
The Who, posing on Brighton pier in mod revival style

displayImages.caption:
Rockers
Leather jackets and biker boots are a timeless look, rooted in practicality
displayImages.altText: Biker in black leather jackets and biker boots
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Rockers
Leather jackets and biker boots are a timeless look, rooted in practicality

displayImages.caption:
Hippies
Writer Ken Kesey and the Merry Pranksters kickstarted the hippy era with their LSD-fuelled gigs, known as Acid Tests, in 1964
displayImages.altText: Writer Ken Kesey and the Merry Pranksters
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Hippies
Writer Ken Kesey and the Merry Pranksters kickstarted the hippy era with their LSD-fuelled gigs, known as Acid Tests, in 1964

displayImages.caption:
Bikers
Easy Rider, directed by Dennis Hopper and starring Peter Fonda (pictured), Jack Nicholson and Hopper himself, was a lament for the fading dreams of the hippy counterculture, and brought biker style to a wider audience
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Bikers
Easy Rider, directed by Dennis Hopper and starring Peter Fonda (pictured), Jack Nicholson and Hopper himself, was a lament for the fading dreams of the hippy counterculture, and brought biker style to a wider audience

displayImages.caption:
Glam Rockers
David Bowie, the pop chameleon who bought originality and artistic credibility to glam-rock
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Glam Rockers
David Bowie, the pop chameleon who bought originality and artistic credibility to glam-rock

displayImages.caption:
Punks
The Sex Pistols’ anarchic style was matched by an unprecedented musical and cultural nihilism
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Punks
The Sex Pistols’ anarchic style was matched by an unprecedented musical and cultural nihilism

displayImages.caption:
Metalheads
Denim and leather-clad Iron Maiden fans play air guitar in 1980 Photograph: Virginia Turbett/Redferns
displayImages.altText: Denim and leather-clad Iron Maiden fans play air guitar in 1980
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Metalheads
Denim and leather-clad Iron Maiden fans play air guitar in 1980

displayImages.caption:
New Romantics
Teenagers at the Blitz nightclub, London, 1979: outlandish dressers and designers who went on to influence the New Romantic movement Photograph: Eugene Adabari/REX/Shutterstock
displayImages.altText: Teenagers at the Blitz nightclub, London, 1979
displayImages.cleanCaption:
New Romantics
Teenagers at the Blitz nightclub, London, 1979: outlandish dressers and designers who went on to influence the New Romantic movement

displayImages.caption:
Goths
Parasols, boot buckles, back-combed hair and cigarette-holders – goths accessorising
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Goths
Parasols, boot buckles, back-combed hair and cigarette-holders – goths accessorising

displayImages.caption:
Hip-hop
Blending sportswear and bling, Run-DMC changed the course of hip-hop in the 80s
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Hip-hop
Blending sportswear and bling, Run-DMC changed the course of hip-hop in the 80s

displayImages.caption:
Ravers
The Haçienda nightclub, 1989, epicentre of acid house and the Madchester scene Photograph: PYMCA/REX Shutterstock
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Ravers
The Haçienda nightclub, 1989, epicentre of acid house and the Madchester scene
